author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SONIA HOLDING STEADY AND MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD...
summary: ...SONIA HOLDING STEADY AND MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sun Oct 26 the center of Sonia was located near 13.7, -119.9 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA HOLDING STEADY AND MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sun Oct 26 the center of Sonia was located near 13.7, -119.9 with movement W at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
